about_the_game:
You’ve Woken up on an island, a handmade knife embedded in your leg, and your memory is blank. You’re hungry, thirsty, and confused, not knowing how you got there. All you can do is survive, gathering resources to build and eating whatever food you find to stay alive. Coming across dangerous wildlife, craft weapons to try and keep yourself safe.

Take your survival skills up a level by playing online where the most crucial threat is other players. You must build a shelter or join clans with others to improve each others survivability with raiding being ordinary and done more often by other players or clans.

content_descriptors.notes: may contain violence towards players and structures

detailed_description:
You’ve Woken up on an island, a handmade knife embedded in your leg, and your memory is blank. You’re hungry, thirsty, and confused, not knowing how you got there. All you can do is survive, gathering resources to build and eating whatever food you find to stay alive. Coming across dangerous wildlife, craft weapons to try and keep yourself safe.

Take your survival skills up a level by playing online where the most crucial threat is other players. You must build a shelter or join clans with others to improve each others survivability with raiding being ordinary and done more often by other players or clans.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB or more
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: OS X El Capitan 10.11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Exist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 3240 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 720 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 8400 or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050TI or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You’ve Woken up on a island, a handmade knife embedded in your leg and your memory is blank. You’re hungry, thirsty and confused not knowing how you got there. All you can do is survive, gathering resources, build shelter and eating whatever food you find to stay alive.
